title: India Cuts Off Foreign Funding of Mother Teresa’s Charity
content:
1. India Cuts Off Foreign Funding of Mother Teresa’s Charity  The New York Times
  2. Indian authorities to block foreign funding for Mother Teresa's charity  The Washington Post
  3. India bans Mother Teresa charity from receiving funds from abroad  The Guardian
  4. India Bars Foreign Donations to Christian Group Founded by Mother Teresa  The Wall Street Journal
  5. India restricts foreign funding for Mother Teresa’s charity  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
